title: Fairwords Policies and Support | eComms Help Center
content:
Fairwords Policies and Support

Transitioning to MyComplianceOffice website and services

Updated over 10 months ago

Fairwords has been acquired by MyComplianceOffice. All standard policies, disclaimers, and support information have been migrated over to the MyComplianceOffice website.

For convenience the following links will direct you to this important information.

MCO Service Policies

We are happy to announce expanded support offerings and geographic coverage is now available. While you can still send help requests to help@fairwords.com we recommend updating your information to MyComplianceOffice:
